article_title: States Lift Nurse Practitioner Hurdles Amid Doctor Shortage

article_metadata.description: An increasing number of states are eliminating hurdles for patients who want easier access to treatment from a nurse practitioner with Nebraska joining 19 other states by granting patients “full and direct” access to these advanced degree nurses. Such full practice authority allows nurse practitioners to evaluate patients, make diagnoses, “order [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
